item.title: #en @ 1526397677327593472
item.description: I hate to be a hater. But that "open data" portal made by that big GIS company is an absolute dumpster fire. The fact that someone actually QAed it and gave it the all good horrifies me. Then I find "open data" distributed exclusively in proprietary file formats and I rage hard. https://t.co/OVoJYQd1yZ
